road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Xiao Cai sheds light on the realities of pricing at Guanghua Market.
sentences.chinese: 小蔡一语道破光华商家的订价策略。

sentences.english: Actually I'm a guard against heart is heavy, who also don't believe that.
sentences.chinese: 却可以一语道破你隐藏着的是个怎样的人。

sentences.english: But can you hide victims of is a how of person.
sentences.chinese: 却可以一语道破你隐藏着的是个怎样的人。

sentences.english: Appreciate Jiang Kejun's candor about use of "low-carbon city."
sentences.chinese: 欣赏姜克隽的直率，一语道破了“低碳城市”的用途。

sentences.english: Wilson captures the dilemma of our era.
sentences.chinese: 一语道破了我们这个时代的困境。

sentences.english: She pointed the important position which designing played in the national development.
sentences.chinese: 一语道破了设计对一个国家发展的重要性。
